channel.title: Version 5.3 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.3.0 (2022-10-07) Change Change In th' effort t' comply wit' WCAG standards, th' implementat'n o' th' collaps'ble menu was changed. Th' functionality o' th' new implementat'n does not work wit' old browsers (Internet Explorer 11). New New Image formatt'n has two new classes t' align images t' th' left or right. Additionally, th' already exist'n inline opt'n be now documented.
